title: $\sigma_k$-Yamabe measure
abstract:
We found a special divergence structure for the $\sigma_k$-Yamabe operator
and use it to get a monotonicity formula. We also get an interior $L^{\infty}$
estimate via its $L^1$ norm for the $\sigma_k$-Yamabe operator when $1\le k \le
\frac{n}{2}$. Combining these two tools, we prove the weak continuity of the
$\sigma_k$-Yamabe measure with respect to convergence in measure.
